name: RainbowBridge
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rainbow bridge
des:
The Rainbow Bridge is the theme of several works of poetry written in the 1980s and 1990s that speak of an other-worldly place where pets go upon death, eventually to be reunited with their owners. 

If you've lost a pet, chances are you've heard of the Rainbow Bridge. This bridge is a mythical overpass said to connect heaven and Earth and a spot where grieving pet owners reunite for good with their departed furry friends.

Dedicated to Shelby and Sydney!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
